metadata.Title: CVE-2022-22890 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: There is an Assertion 'arguments_type != SCANNER_ARGUMENTS_PRESENT &&arguments_type != SCANNER_ARGUMENTS_PRESENT_NO_REG' failed at/jerry-core/parser/js/js-scanner-util.c in Jerryscript 3.0.0.

criterions.comment: iotjs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
